meanings.definition: A hot drink made by infusing the dried, crushed leaves of the tea plant in boiling water.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, I enjoy a cup of hot tea to start my day.
meanings.sent2: After a long day at work, she likes to relax with a soothing cup of tea.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally knocked over a cup of tea, creating a small mess.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a warm cup of tea on a cold day, comforting and calming.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly brewed tea filled the room, inviting everyone to take a sip.

meanings.definition: The dried leaves or buds of the tea plant used to make this drink.
meanings.sent1: She bought a box of tea leaves to brew her own tea at home.
meanings.sent2: The tea leaves were carefully selected to ensure a rich flavor in the tea.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel mistook the tea leaves for nuts and tried to bury them in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The tea leaves danced in the teapot, releasing their essence into the water.
meanings.sent5: The tea leaves unfurled in the hot water, creating a beautiful infusion of flavors.

meanings.definition: A light meal eaten in the late afternoon or early evening, typically consisting of sandwiches and cakes with tea to drink.
meanings.sent1: On weekends, they often have a lovely tea with sandwiches and cakes.
meanings.sent2: The tea was accompanied by a delightful spread of sandwiches and pastries.
meanings.sent3: The tea party in the garden was a charming affair with delicious treats.
meanings.sent4: The tea and snacks were like a mini feast, satisfying both hunger and thirst.
meanings.sent5: The table was set with a variety of teas and delectable finger foods for the guests.
